function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)
	local idScholarFollower = Hydra.QuestGetFollower("NPC_QST_Step_Scholar_Follower")
	
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idScholarFollower) then
		
		Hydra.QuestFollowerTakeOwnership(idScholarFollower)
		Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idScholarFollower, id_Scholar_market, "NPC_RUN", true)
		Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(idScholarFollower, id_Scholar_market)
		Hydra.QActorDelete(idScholarFollower)
	end
	
end

function Start()
	local idScholarFollower = Hydra.QuestGetFollower("NPC_QST_Step_Scholar_Follower")
	
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idScholarFollower) then
		
		Hydra.QActorPlayConversation(bark_Scholar_follow, idSelf, idScholarFollower)
	end
end

function Start(idActor, snoQuest)
	local idScholarFollower = Hydra.QuestGetFollower("NPC_QST_Step_Scholar_Follower")
	
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idScholarFollower) then
	
		Hydra.QuestFollowerTakeOwnership(idScholarFollower)
		-- have Scholar play convo, checking in with player...
		Hydra.QActorPlayConversation(bark_Scholar_house2, idSelf, idScholarFollower)
		-- then run to "house" position
		Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idScholarFollower, id_Scholar_house, "NPC_RUN", true)
		Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(idScholarFollower, id_Scholar_house)
		Hydra.QActorDelete(idScholarFollower)
		
	end
	
end

function Start(idActorNPC, sConversation, idActorPlayer)
	idScholarClone = Hydra.CreatePersonalClone(id_Scholar_house)
		
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idScholarClone) then
		
		Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idScholarClone, id_loc_leavingHouse, "NPC_Run", true) 
		Hydra.QActorFadeAndDelete(idScholarClone, 1)
	end
	
end

function Start(idActorNPC, sConversation, idActorPlayer)
	
	idNonbelieverClone = Hydra.CreatePersonalClone(id_ghost_nonbeliever)
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idNonbelieverClone) then
		Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idNonbelieverClone, id_loc_leavingHouse, "NPC_Run", true) 
		Hydra.QActorFadeAndDelete(idNonbelieverClone, 1)
	end
	
	local idScholarFollower = Hydra.QuestGetFollower("NPC_QST_Step_Scholar_Follower")
	
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idScholarFollower) then
		
		Hydra.QuestFollowerTakeOwnership(idScholarFollower)
		Hydra.QActorDelete(idScholarFollower)
	end
	
end

function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)
	-- if variable is false
	if Hydra.IsPlayerVariableSet(idSelf, "QST_Step_ScholarRevised_HouseSequenceStarted") == false then
		
		local idScholarFollower = Hydra.QuestGetFollower("NPC_QST_Step_Scholar_Follower")
	
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idScholarFollower) then
			-- set player var flag
			Hydra.SetPlayerVariableFlag(idSelf, "QST_Step_ScholarRevised_HouseSequenceStarted")
			Hydra.ActorPlayConversation(bark_Scholar_house, idSelf, id_ghost_nonbeliever, id_ghost_neighbor, idScholarFollower)
			Hydra.ActorDisableAI(idScholarFollower)
			Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idScholarFollower, id_Scholar_house, "NPC_RUN", true)
			Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(idScholarFollower, id_Scholar_house)
			-- Hydra.QActorDelete(idScholarFollower)
		end
	end	
end

	-- if variable is false
	if Hydra.IsPlayerVariableSet(idSelf, "QST_Step_ScholarRevised_HouseSequenceStarted") == false then
	
		local idScholarFollower = Hydra.QuestGetFollower("NPC_QST_Step_Scholar_Follower")

			-- set player var flag

			Hydra.ActorPlayConversation(bark_Scholar_house, idSelf, id_ghost_nonbeliever, id_ghost_neighbor, idScholarFollower)
			Hydra.ActorDisableAI(idScholarFollower)
			Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idScholarFollower, id_Scholar_house, "NPC_RUN", true)
			Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(idScholarFollower, id_Scholar_house)
			-- Hydra.QActorDelete(idScholarFollower)

	end	
end
